Articles.Content:
First Contract Update will out very soon, but I didn't see somthing like "We'd like you to launch the first module for International Space Station? It will be a huge project realised by many countries across the Kerbin." in any test video.

There would be four types of contracts:

1. Where you need to make your own module: "Can you build and send new truss piece to support larger solar panels?" or "Station is getting overppulated so can you build and send new habitat module?"

2. Where you need to send existing module for other companies "We are happy to announce, that C7 areospace is joining the Duna Orbital Station project. We've just tested our new science lab, but we haven't got rocket big enough to lift it up

into space, Can you help us?

3. Where you need to launch first module for new station "We highly recommend you to stert new orbital sation around Laythe, it will make manned mission to this body easier. Are you interested?"

4. Where you need to move your station from one place to another or deorbit it: "We collected almost all science we can get from the Minimus, so Minimus Station we don't need it anymore here, still we haven't explored Eve yet. It would be great to move it there."

They will unlock after first docking on the orbit.

I've got another idea for space stations - when you switch type of vessel to "station" You will be able to choose your station's name when all modules still have their own names, and you can view their parameters separately in the orbit, and after clicking on the station in orbital view it will show you number of docked modules in it's parameters.

I like it, the last bit about naming the modals seems like it would be a bit tricky to implement but possible i suppose. I feel that ideas like this and the others all over the forum are going to be looked at when they finish up contracts in the next update. Keep it up!
If they spill every mission details in the previews, it won't be much of a surprise anymore, will it?
Modded contracts. Becuase mods = 42 = answer to everything!
